snippet: Another former employee of SAC Capital Advisors has been accused of insider trading, but investors don’t seem to mind, as they continue to put money into the hedge fund in search of great returns.
abstract: Another former employee of SAC Capital Advisors has been accused of insider trading, but investors don’t seem to mind, as they continue to put money into the hedge fund in search of great returns.

headline.main: When Wall Street Investors Favor Performance Over Ethics
headline.print_headline: A Longstanding Wall Street Custom of Favoring Performance Over Ethics
